text: Bombs Over Burma (also known as The Devil's Sister) is a 1942 American World War II drama movie directed by Joseph H. Lewis and was based on the story by Milton Raison. It stars Anna May Wong, Noel Madison, Nedrick Young, Dan Seymour, and Frank Lackteen. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1942 drama movies Category:1942 war movies Category:American war movies Category:1940s American drama movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies directed by Joseph H. Lewis
title: Bombs Over Burma
